name: Heather McKinney
coverLetter: I have 10 years experience trimming. I am experienced with wet and dry trimming. I am also able to use trim machines and clean the machine trimmed buds. EI have experience with various strains. I travel with a complete kit and I am ready to work when I arrive on a job. I am willing to travel within 3 hours from Arcata. I have reliable transportation and can provide my own lodging (tent) and food.
